overview: This series brings you along on all the surprising adventures today's young women are having. Featured cover girl Amber Moore is so excited to see her hookup again that waiting five days seems like forever. She can pass the time touching herself, but only the real thing in the flesh is enough for this blonde. Reina Rae, Kylie Rocket, and Mina Luxx are all here taking risks and getting into the best kinds of trouble.
title: Young Fantasies 8
